trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_00<tab>Hien is ready to undertake the challenge of Bardam's Mettle.

TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_01<tab>If you are to participate in the Naadam and fight alongside the Mol, you must first be recognized as a warrior of the Steppe. To earn this honor, you will be required to complete a rite of passage involving walking in the footsteps of the legendary Bardam and taming a yol. Steeling yourselves, you and your comrades set forth upon the peril-fraught path of the hero's namesake.
※Challenge Bardam's Mettle with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the dungeon's entrance point.

TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_02<tab>At the end of a strange and bewildering journey through Bardam's Mettle, you manage to tame a wild yol in the traditional fashion. Trial complete, you leave with your comrades.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_03<tab>You emerge back at the entrance, breathing a sigh of relief. Wondering what happens next, you turn to speak with Lyse.

TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_04<tab>Suddenly recalling the whistles entrusted to her by Cirina, Lyse brings them forth, handing one to you. With a blow, you summon your respective yols, which circle in the skies above in acknowledgement of your new bond. There can be no doubt: you are now warriors of the Steppe.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_00<tab>Enter Bardam's Mettle.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_000<tab><huff> <puff> This is it! The real trial!
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>Tread softly. We are for hallowed ground, and the kami are restless...
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_010<tab>Nothing left but to begin, then.

TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_011<tab>To complete the trial, we must pass through Bardam's Mettle and each tame a yol. How precisely we are to do this, I am not sure, but since countless warriors before us have succeeded, I imagine we'll muddle through somehow...
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_012<tab>But enough talk! We have a Naadam to win!
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_020<tab>First the trial, then the Naadam, then Doma, then Ala Mhigo! We'll be back home before you know it!
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_025<tab>Quite frankly, if I cannot convince a large bird to follow me, then what hope do I have with the Xaela? Or my own countrymen, for that matter.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>I have stood upon more battlefields than I can count and lived to tell the tale. No bird will be my downfall!
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_100_050<tab>Well fought back there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Things got hairy at times, but I knew we'd manage!
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_050<tab>Oh, right. I've still got those whistles Cirina gave me.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_051<tab>Here's yours. I suppose we ought to give them a try like she said.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_052<tab>Up there, look!
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_053<tab>I think that means we've won them over. That one there is yours, right? The other one is mine. Awww...
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_054<tab>So that's that, then! We're officially warriors of the Steppe!
